title: Uyoku dantai
summary: The Uyoku dantai (Japanese: 右翼団体) refers to Japanese ultranationalist far-right activists, provocateurs, and internet trolls (as Netto-uyoku) often organized in groups. In 1996 and 2013, the National Police Agency estimated that there were over 1,000 right-wing groups in Japan with about 100,000 members in total.[1][2][3]
